item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I got 3G card from Unicom which costs RMB 80 per month, it's good enough for occational use.
500MB monthly traffic limitation, well you can always go beyond that if you don't mind pay more.
item.content:encoded:
I got 3G card from Unicom which costs RMB 80 per month, it’s good enough for occational use.

500MB monthly traffic limitation, well you can always go beyond that if you don’t mind pay more.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Delay, delay, and delay, after sitting on the flight for couple hours (on the runway), we finally took off and I arrived ... 3 hours later than scheduled.
Tough, but I don't want to complain the airline since they don't have control on this case (air traffic control problem).
item.content:encoded:
Delay, delay, and delay, after sitting on the flight for couple hours (on the runway), we finally took off and I arrived … 3 hours later than scheduled.

Tough, but I don’t want to complain the airline since they don’t have control on this case (air traffic control problem).
